item.title: What is Hydroinformatics? Bridging Water Science and Technology
item.description: This article delves into the multifaceted world of hydroinformatics, exploring its history, applications, job market, and future prospects.

item.title: Hydroinformatics Engineer Roadmap
item.description: This roadmap outlines the essential study topics and skills needed to work as a hydroinformatics engineer.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi there! I’m Hamed Samsami, a Hydroinformatics Engineer based in the beautiful landscapes of Norway. With over 15 years of experience as a civil engineer, my journey has been deeply rooted in the design and construction of water infrastructure. But my story isn’t just about concrete and pipesâ€”it’s also about code, algorithms, and the magic that happens when technology meets water. The Early Days Ever since I was a teenager, I’ve been fascinated by programming.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.description: Hello there! I’m thrilled that you’re interested in reaching out. Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to chat about the fascinating world of hydroinformatics, I’m all ears. Let’s make a splash together! Reach Me Here Feel free to drop me a message using any of the contact methods below. I promise to get back to you as soon as I can. item.title: My Projects
item.description: Welcome to my projects page! Here you’ll find a diverse collection of innovative initiatives that blend my passion for hydroinformatics, programming, and open-source development. Each project is a reflection of my commitment to leveraging technology for solving real-world challenges in the water industry and beyond. Dive in and explore! HydroHamed A Digital Garden for Hydroinformatics Enthusiasts HydroHamed is my digital gardenâ€”a dynamic and evolving hub designed for hydroinformatics enthusiasts, engineers, researchers, and scientists.
